news.name: About Facebook
news.description: Irish regulators slapped Facebook parent Meta with a €265 million fine on Monday, the company's latest punishment for breaching strict European Union data privacy rules.

news.name: Ukraine war
news.description: Estonia's foreign minister has called on other European countries to double their defence expenditure because of the Russian war in Ukraine -- adding that his own country planned raise national defence spending to 3% of GDP.

news.name: Plastic pollution treaty
news.description: In March, the United Nations Environment Assembly passed a resolution to end plastic pollution - an agreement described by delegates as the most significant green accord since the 2015 Paris Climate conference

news.name: Qatar World Cup
news.description:
Morocco pulled off yet another World Cup shock, and it was Belgium's aging “Golden Generation” that took the hit this time.
Argentina and France will met in the final next Sunday, 18.12.2022 year. Corvatia and Morocco will play 3rd places.
